mdRecord.dcterms:title: Official map of Washington: Fifteenth International Christian Endeavor Convention, July 8-13, 1896 / prepared by the Committee of '96 ; presented with the compliments of the Estey Organ and Piano Co., Brattleboro, Vermont, and New York, N.Y.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: International Christian Endeavor Convention (15th : 1896 : Washington, D.C.) [original]
United Society of Christian Endeavor. Committee of '96. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows street railways and radial distances from the Ellipse. [original]
"Copyright, 1896, by Anson S. Taylor and Wm. B. Robison, Trustees." [original]
Includes text, colored illustrations, and index to points of interest including main meeting places, churches, hotels, monuments and statues, parks, cemeteries, and more. [original]
Index to points of interest and blank area on verso. [original]
Map shows street names and is divided into quadrants. [original]
Table under title: "Location of street railways and transfer station." [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS. Imperfect: has marginal tears, and a taped repair on verso. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington (D.C.)--Maps
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
